extendedInfo.description: This is the essential Chipotle Mobile Ordering app for our Android community â with ordering available for our COLORADO, CHEYENNE, ALBUQUERQUE, PHILADELPHIA, KANSAS CITY, and MINNEAPOLIS customers (for now). For the rest of you hungry Android people, you can use location finder and menu features while weâre working to bring ordering to your market.  With the Chipotle Mobile Ordering app on your Android device, ordering a carnitas burrito with extra guac and no lettuce is as simple as touch, pick and pay.  No wandering the streets.  No sitting in front of a computer required.  Just grab your phone, place your customer order, pay with credit and pick it up at the Chipotle nearest you. Features: -	Locate the nearest Chipotle when youâre away from home (limited locations, for now).  There are even directions to get you there.  -	See the full menu of options and customize to your heartâs content  - just like you would in the store or on the web. -	Use your Chipotle.com account login to access all your Favorites and Recent Orders as well as payment info.  -	Easily order your food from your Android device. No computer neededâ¦ and no waiting in line.-	Pay with a credit card or a gift card.  Its password protected, secure and easy to save.Current Chipotle Mobile Ordering for Android Locations:-	72 locations in Colorado, Cheyenne, WY and Albuquerque, NM-	30 locations in Kansas City, MO -	31 locations in Philadelphia, PA-  	57 locations in Minneapolis and St. Paul, MNPermissions:-	Uses Location Services (allows the app to find a restaurant near you) -	Uses Local Storage (allows the app to save files locally)-	Reads google service configuration (used for google maps)-	Uses Full network access (communicates with Chipotle systems)

reviews.title: Finaly
reviews.comment: I have been waiting a long time for this app and it is well worth the wait. Ordering is fast and simple and unlike the website, it gives you the brown rice option. It is select markets only at the moment while they make sure it works well with their existing system, so for those outside of the service areas please be patient a little while longer. Your burritos will be soon.
reviews.author: Colt Gustafson

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I use to use this on my iPhone all the time to order and now on android I cant order.  Developers need to step it up on android its clearly a more useful operating system
reviews.author: Peter Papoulakos

reviews.title: Get onboard with utah
reviews.comment: I grew up in Colorado with your wonderful food. I live in Utah now and I\'m glad to see your stores out here. Bring more stores oyt here. But get on board and get the app working for this market, you\'re losing my money because I need to order a while I\'m on the go.
reviews.author: Ben Angus

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time. Better off going in to place order. Uninstalled....
reviews.author: sean alemzadeh

reviews.title: Works great for me
reviews.comment: So based on the other comments the only reason people don\'t like it is because it isn\'t in their area. I live in the Minneapolis area and it works great. Pretty much just like ordering online. Thanks for creating the app so I don\'t need to wait in line!
reviews.author: ryan Martineau

reviews.title: Needs update for android!
reviews.comment: Please release new update for android ordering! I love chipolte and would love to order on my android device
reviews.author: Kyle Marquis

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: At long last! This is burrito heaven. Thank you for finally acknowledging the rest of us with an android app. Works great so far.
reviews.author: Jon Hilgers

reviews.title: No Houston no 5 stars
reviews.comment: Simple as that. Hire some IT people and get your app working on Android...
reviews.author: Adam Gomez

reviews.title: About time
reviews.comment: I love chipotle, and I have been waiting forever for this app since it was introduced to IOS over a year ago.
reviews.author: t uy

reviews.title: No Ordering for Ohio :/
reviews.comment: Completely useless unless you live in the designated spot for ordering or own an iPhone. I love chipotle just as much as an iPhone user.. where\'s my options?! 2 stars for now.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Springer

reviews.title: Lack of cities makes it useless

reviews.comment: Its in Rehoboth! Great app! 5 stars!
reviews.author: Riley Kratzer

reviews.title: Definitely could get better
reviews.comment: Just found a fly right on the  lettuce.  In my bowl  :( hygiene could help a lot Where ??? The store located on lee hyway in fairfax  va ..  The store close to golfsmith !!!   Very disappointed !! :$/*@#
reviews.author: Odir Valencia

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I already know where my closest locations are. What is the point if you don\'t have ordering capability from the Android app? You seem to forget that Android has the largest market share of smart phones now. Or are you going for the snob factor of only letting iPhone users order from their app?
reviews.author: Ravikanth Kolla

reviews.title: Make it available in Ohio!
reviews.comment: As soon as that changes so will my review.
reviews.author: Chris Milne

reviews.title: Pennsylvania?
reviews.comment: Come on now, no ordering and you can\'t even check the menu?
reviews.author: Dylan Taylor

reviews.title: They Disclose in What Locations App Ordering is Available
reviews.comment: You can\'t be mad at the app makers for online ordering not being available in your area when they clearly disclose it. Sometimes people forget to read prior to downloading. That\'s not their fault lol...
reviews.author: Karen Davis

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work in Cincinnati Ohio !  Stupid
reviews.author: Daniel Miller

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: It says that it\'s not yet available to order online in the peninsula bay area. When can anyone order online here???
reviews.author: Victor P Garcia
